name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Nancy M. ZUBRITSKY, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 42 Western District Allocatur Docket 1991

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Nancy M. ZUBRITSKY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
In accordance with Commonwealth, Dept. of Transportation v. O’Connell, 521 Pa. 242, 555 A.2d 873 (1989), the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, and, furthermore, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed 137 Pa.Cmwlth. 647, 584 A.2d 1105, and this matter is remanded for new trial.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
590 A.2d 754
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Nancy M. ZUBRITSKY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 23, 1991.
